title: Convention-based dogfood resolve
body: Replace dogfood: true flag with vendor key convention. See docs/planning/epics/resolve-by-convention.md

title: Replace dogfood flag lookup with vendor key convention in resolve script
body: Change find_dogfood_vendor() to look for vendors["git-dogfood"] key instead of scanning for dogfood: true. Define VENDOR_KEY constant. Update docstring.

title: Remove dogfood: true from .vendored/config.json
body: Remove the dogfood: true field from the git-dogfood vendor entry. No other fields change.

title: Update tests for convention-based resolve
body: Rewrite test_resolve.py: assert on vendor key presence, not dogfood flag. Remove test_returns_none_when_dogfood_false and test_first_dogfood_wins. Add test for key found among other vendors.

title: Update workflow comments to reflect convention-based resolve
body: Update comments in dogfood.yml and templates/github/workflows/dogfood.yml to say 'looks for git-dogfood vendor key' instead of 'dogfood: true'.
